subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi converted two penalty kicks in the first half to lead host Barcelona over A.C. Milan, 3-1, on Tuesday night and into the Champions League semifinals for the fifth consecutive season.
snippet: Lionel Messi converted two penalty kicks in the first half to lead host Barcelona over A.C. Milan, 3-1, on Tuesday night and into the Champions League semifinals for the fifth consecutive season.
